Class UnregulatedMotor

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BaseMotor, DCMotor

    public class UnregulatedMotor
extends BasicMotor
    Abstraction for an Lego Mindstorms motors with no speed regulation. http://www.ev3dev.org/docs/motors/
